titleStmt.title: The weary traveller his eternal rest being a discourse of that blessed rest here, which leads to endless rest hereafter. By H. H. D. D. Rector of Snaylwell, and Canon of Ely.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Henry, 1610 or 11-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. G. and J. P. for R. Clavell, at the Peacock in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2403 lacks pages 33, 34 and 61-64.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Peacock in St. Paul's Church-yard
